headline: Duke Energy commits $500,000 to boost local storm preparedness initiatives in North Carolina
summary: Duke Energy Foundation today announced a new commitment of $500,000 to support storm preparedness efforts in local communities across North Carolina. Eligible organizations are invited to apply for grants of up to $25,000.

headline: Duke Energy Expands Assistance Programs for Customers in Need
summary: Duke Energy offers various assistance programs for low-income households, including bill credits, weatherization and free home energy assessments In 2024, nearly $90 million was provided in energy bill assistance to North Carolina customers, aiding ...

headline: Institutional investors control 67% of Duke Energy Corporation (NYSE:DUK) and were rewarded last week after stock increased 4.0%
